title: Quirky Series - Animals ULTIMATE Pack
description: A collection of 180 quirky animals with wacky animations
longDescription:
Promo Video: https://youtu.be/EVKq8aHhXYI


This pack is a combination of these Mega Packs:

Mega Pack Vol.1

Mega Pack Vol.2

Mega Pack Vol.3

Mega Pack Vol.4


FEATURES

 ✔️ One-hundred-and-eighty (180) animal asset

 ✔️ Tiny 16x4 px texture [diffuse map only]

 ✔️ Rigged/Skeleton

 ✔️ 18 animations

 ✔️ 26 morph targets (blendshapes/shapekeys) for facial expression

 ✔️ 4 Levels of Detail [min 40 up to 9,000 tris]

 ✔️ Mobile, AR/VR ready

 ❌ Vertex color

❌ Clean (non-overlap) UV mapping 


ANIMALS

 Arctic 01 (9): Arctic Fox, Ox, Penguin, Polar Bear, Reindeer, Sea Lion, Snow Owl, Snow Weasel, Walrus

 Farm 01 (9): Buffalo, Chick, Cow, Donkey, Duck, Hen, Pig, Rooster, Sheep

 Forest 01 (9): Crow, Eagle, Fox, Hog, Hornbill, Owl, Raccoon, Snake, Wolf

 Pets 01 (9): Cat, Dog, Dove, Goldfish, Mice, Parrot, Pigeon, Rabbit, Tortoise

 Safari 01 (9): Cheetah, Elephant, Flamingo, Gazelle, Hippo, Hyena, Ostrich, Rhino, Zebra


 Arctic 02 (9) : Beluga, Cougar, Hare, Husky, Lynx, Moose, Narwhal, Puffin, Snow Leopard

Farm 02 (9) : Alpaca, Bull, Goat, Goose, Horse, Lamb, Llama, Mallard, Turkey

Forest 02 (9) : Badger, Bear, Cardinal, Deer, Lemur, Marten, Mole, Skunk, Toucan

Pets 02 (9) : Chameleon, Chipmunk, Ferret, Hamster, Hedgehog, Iguana, Monkey, Python, Squirrel

Safari 02 (9) : Antelope, Baboon, Bison, Giraffe, Jackal, Lion, Lioness, Serval, Wildebeest


Desert 01 (9) : Armadillo, Bighorn, Camel, Coyote, Gila Monster, Golden Eagle, Horned Lizard, Pronghorn, Rattlesnake

Island 01 (9) : Emu, Kangaroo, Koala, Kookaburra, Platypus, Possum, Quokka, Tasmanian Devil, Wombat

Jungle 01 (9) : Bat, Cobra, Gorilla, Panda, Peacock, Red Panda, Sloth, Tapir, Tiger

River 01 (9) : Arowana, Beaver, Carp, Crocodile, Frog, Kingfisher, Manatee, Snapping Turtle, Swan

Sea 01 (9) : Clownfish, Crab, Dolphin, Lobster, Orca, Pelican, Sea Horse, Sea Otter, Squid


Desert 02 (9) : Fennec Fox, Gemsbok, Jackrabbit, Javelina, Jerboa, Meerkat, Porcupine, Vulture Woodpecker

Island 02 (9) : Bandicoot, Dingo, Echidna, Flying Fox, Frill-Necked Lizard, Kakapo, Kiwi, Numbat, Quail

Jungle 02 (9) : Chimp, Gaur, Jaguar, Leopard, Macaw, Monitor Lizard, Mousedeer, Orang Utan, Snake

River 02 (9) : Alligator, Bass, Capybara, Catfish, Mudskipper, Otter, Piranha, River Dolphin, Shoebill.

Sea 02 (9) : Jellyfish, Octopus, Prawn, Salmon, Sardine, Seagull, Tuna, Turtle, Whale


ANIMATIONS

Attack | Bounce | Clicked | Death

Eat | Fear | Fly | Hit

Idle_A | Idle_B | Idle_C

Jump | Roll | Run | Sit

Spin/Splash | Swim | Walk


Morph Targets (blendshapes/shapekeys):

eyes.blink | eyes.happy | eyes.sad | eyes.sad

eyes.annoyed | eyes.squint | eyes.shrink | eyes.dead

eyes.lookOut | eyes.lookIn | eyes.lookUp | eyes.lookDown

eyes.excited-1 | eyes.excited-2 | eyes.rabid

eyes.spin-1 | eyes.spin-2 | eyes.spin-3

eyes.cry-1 | eyes.cry-2 | eyes.trauma

teardrop-1.L | teardrop-2.L | teardrop-1.R | teardrop-2.R

sweat-1.L | sweat-2.L | sweat-1.R | sweat-2.R


--


Email: omabuarts@gmail.com

Website: https://omabuarts.com
technicalDetails:
Rigged: (Yes)

Rigged to Epic skeleton: (No)

Animated: (Yes)

Number of Animations: 18

Animation type: (In-place)

Number of characters: 180

Number of LODs: 4

Vertex counts of characters: Roughly 300-9000 per animal LOD

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 180

Number of Textures: 180

Texture Resolutions: (16x4 px for each animal)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: -

Important/Additional Notes: -


Changelog:

v1.4: [⚠️WE RECOMMEND BACKING UP YOUR PROJECT BEFORE UPDATING⚠️]

Scaled down each animal by 0.4x to better fit the standard humanoid scale

Removed the 'x' hole behind each animal

Improvised animation and collider of some animals

Reorganized folders


v1.3:

Added Attack, Hit, and Swim/Fly animations - each animal now have 18 unique animations.

Added 26 morph targets (blend shapes/shape keys) for facial expressions - e.g. happy, cry, sleep, etc.


v1.2:

 Included individual animation in separate files

 Added one more LOD (4 in total)


v1.1:

 Polished the mesh

 Added 3 LODs

 

v1.0:

 Initial release
